summary: The Book of Job is an ancient story from the Bible, written a long time ago, around the 7th to 3rd centuries BCE. It tells the story of a man named Job who is very religious and lives a good life. God asks Satan if Job will stay faithful if he loses everything. Satan makes Job poor, takes away his family, and causes him pain, but Job remains loyal. The book shows how Job argues with his friends and proves his innocence to God. It teaches us about faith and God's power.
title: Book of Job
